attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To petition Mr Blair to hold a public inquiry into Lloyd’s handling of the asbestos crisis in particular their compliance with the law and the performance of the Government's regulation of Lloyd’s. 
A result of the pensioner's inquiry has been to uncover a failure by the UK Govt to correctly regulate that Industry , it seems right and just that the Lloyd’s investors should be dealt with on a similar basis. The fact of more votes in the pension issue should not influence a decision as it is the errors and failures that are important to discover and correct. 
It would appear that Lloyd’s are still not complying fully with the law on audit.
We welcome the Prime Minister’s actions in establishing this petition right and call on him to take action in holding an inquiry.

rejection.details: The title of a petition must be call to action, not your name.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
